website_summaries.verdict: Keep your desk clutter free with this durable, under the desk headset stand.
pros: Choose between the use of adhesive tape or screws for an easy and customized installation
The included wire clips and cutouts make wire management simple
The stand itself plugs into the wall instead of your computer, freeing up your computer's USB ports
The stand has additional USB ports as well
cons: The power cord runs a little short

customer_reviews.title: Works nice Pros: Adhesive - 3m tape
customer_reviews.text: Works nice Pros: Adhesive - 3m tape, extremely sturdy even when I have my beats headphone, gaming headphone, and watch on it. Charging - Never really have to worry about how fast it charges Cons: 3 ports - somehow everytime I'm using 3 ports at once, it will not work. It will charge on and off literally every half second. I usually charge my iphone, ipad pro, and watch at the same time with original apple chargers. I am not sure if it is because the ipad pro is takes too much charge.
customer_reviews.author: iWin4Rice

customer_reviews.title: ... about it before I bought it but it is good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: I should have read more about it before I bought it but it is good for what it is. I was actually wanting a USB hub not a charger but in the end it does what it says it was supposed to and I can't fault them because I didn't read it. I am not sure if I would leave it to the 3M tape to stay up but it seemed strong enough, I have 2 sets of headphones hanging from it and AKG bluetooth set and my PC gaming headset so didn't want to take the chance it might fall and something break, so used the screws.
customer_reviews.author: T. Madore Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good but missing the mounting tape.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, it's good. I will say one thing I wish it was the power cord was on the back vs the top of it, it didn't come with the mounting tape on it or have it in the box. Besides that it works great, it can charge my tablet and my phone without being slow at charging it, it also has a light that indicates it is receiving power, I could take or leave that tbh, I rather it light up when something's plugged into it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: adhesion didn't hold - UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: I don't think one of the versions of this (the non adhesive) is a bad product. While I bought the adhesive version, the only issue was with the tape. I taped it up, left it alone for a couple days. Then when I went and actually hung headphones from it, I found it all on the ground the next morning. update: vendor is mailing me new adhesive, I'll update based on if it works. But they were also VERY friendly to work with, and tried very hard to fix my issue. Changing my review to reflect quality customer service, and to remind everyone that the device still 'worked' for me, it charges. Just maybe doesn't 'hold'
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gaughan

customer_reviews.title: USB ports don't hold up.  Didn't last a year.
customer_reviews.text: Since these are power only ports, one would assume that they'd be durable enough to handle anything past simple thumb drives. But it's not. The ports lose retention almost immediately, and then as the retention support continues to deteriorate, it opens up the inevitable possibility that the plastic plate inside the ports will simply just break off from the stress of cables hanging from it. Don't bother with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: ****2 MONTH UPDATE**** One USB port decided to self destruct. Questionable quality. Contacting MFG to see how customer support is. Good quality. As others have mentioned, the power cable should have been oriented facing backward, however, the mounting screw-hole would have been blocked by the cable. A removable power cable would have solved this issue. The loop isn't very noticeable, especially when you mount it an inch or two back from the face of the desk. The product looks good and functions as intended. The only thing I wish this had was at least one USB Type-C plug.
customer_reviews.author: Dixon Cider

customer_reviews.title: Broken after just 1 month
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the mount, it was great. Saved a bunch of desk space and gave me a nice place to store and charge some devices. Unfortunately, within a month of use, ALL THREE USB ports broke off and fell into the device. It was very flimsly built internally so now it's useless. Pretty much a waste of the $23 spent on it. I wish I could say more, but when it breaks after simple use, it's pretty hard to be happy.
customer_reviews.author: pooks1225

customer_reviews.title: Great! But needs to be installed with the screws...
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product with a nice build quality and great functionality. In my experience, the adhesive strip is useless and you must screw it in. Cleaned my surface, stuck it to my desk and 24 hours later it was on the floor. Didn't even get a chance to try it out yet. Fortunately I was able to screw it in and it is wonderful. I am now able to hang two large, around ear style headphones with ease. If you are looking for a product like this, just keep in mind you probably will have to install it with the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk accessory
customer_reviews.text: You have your phone, your wireless headset, your tablet, your game controller, and other things at your desk. Your desk is cluttered and covered in cables. This product solves all of that with an under-desk mounting system using either screws, 3M adhesive pads, or both if you want. You can plug in three USB cables for charging, and hang two different items on the wings. I love not having my headset just laying on my desk somewhere, and I can charge it while storing it! Great value, great build quality, get it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Finson

customer_reviews.title: cool idea
customer_reviews.text: while this is a cool idea, I didn't like the over all quality of it . the USB ports seem like they will rip out if you yank whatever is plug in to it . i would true these with my headsets and watch etc. the usb function has worked okay still for me with no issues but it just the feeling that one of these days they're going to rip out that bothers me . over all the product is decent . This also comes with some cable management tabs that come in handy if wires annoy you like me.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Does what is described.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: I really enjoy using this even though there are flaws. The adhesives for the cord managements need to be stronger because they tend to fall off, I used clear tape to hold up my cords for my desk setup this is what really disappointed me. I bought this as well expecting that it would hold my air pods but the air pods were to thick for the cord holder. Pros: Really holds my Beats Studio 2's very well and the 3 ports are very convenient. Overall I highly recommend this product for your desk and is really useful too if you have a party and your friends need more charging ports while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for headphones + xbox controller and charging everything.
customer_reviews.text: Self adhesive sticks great to my glass desk. I followed the instructions and let the adhesive "cure" 24 hours before I started hanging stuff on it. Now it holds my headset, and I can perfectly balance an xbox controller between one side and the bottom of my desk. It's almost like it was made for it. The USB keeps my phone and xbox controller charged no problem. Would 100% buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick'll FixIt

customer_reviews.title: Neatniks FTW!
customer_reviews.text: I like to be well organized, and have a place for everything. The COZOO Headphone Stand filled the need for a convenient headphone/smartwatch charging spot that doesn't take up precious surface space or add to clutter. This handles both nicely. I currently have it under-hanging a bookshelf, and am thinking of getting another to hang inside the CPU door of my desk. This is a vast improvement over the tabletop headphone hangers, and the cord management feature warms my neatnik heart.
customer_reviews.author: keygirlTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and useful
customer_reviews.text: Very glad i bought this super useful. - Appears to be fast charging or at least normal charging. It doesn't do rapid charging on my pixel 2 but a lot of things don't rapid charge my pixel 2 besides the stock charger. It does charge my other gadgets at normal speed though. - nice bright white led light confirms it's powered when plugged in. - double sided tape seems sturdy. Holding a pair of gaming over ear headphones, my fitbit charge 2, and a long usb cable.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer M. Fong

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this the adhesive is trash
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this product was just what i was looking for I followed the instructions on cleaning and attaching the mount and gave it 24hrs to set before i put my headset on it. After about a month the adhesive failed causing it to fall to the ground and my headset to break. The charger portion also get's really hot if more than one thing is plugged in totally couldn't imagine it's safe with all three charging ports plugged in. Needless to say this was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Nalshmire

customer_reviews.title: Do not use with headphones that have a band cushion.
customer_reviews.text: I secured the charger/headphone holder to the underside of my desk with the included screws. It's not going anywhere. The first time I put my headphones there to rest/charge there was a flat spot where the band cushion was completely compressed. Thankfully it came back after a period of time, but I cannot rest my headphones there. So if anything it's just a very convenient charger since it is so close to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good product, mediocre adhesive strip
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive lasted 10 weeks before falling off. Recommend screwing into your desk. Update: Seller CoZoo contacted me and offered a full refund or replacement 3M tape. I accepted replacement tape and am looking forward to having this product back in business! Great customer service from this seller. Bonus: gave me two replacement strips so now I can use one to finally hang my Thor: Ragnarok poster!
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: My package arrived empty.  Will have to re-order.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived empty. Apparently, no one ever actually placed the product into the envelope. Fortunately, I was able to take the (empty) package from the driver, and discover that it was empty, before he left. I gave 4 stars because it looks like it should work, but did want to alert shoppers as to what has happened in the past. Hopefully, mine was the exception. They aren't going to make much money by shipping empty packages.
customer_reviews.author: P. F. Bonney

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little gizmo. Since I rearranged my office, I needed a new place to store my headphones. This mount has three powered USB ports (it plugs in to a regular household AC socket), and the "arms" allow me to hang my headset. Since the headphones need a powered USB port, this is perfect. While the mount comes with 3M adhesive, it also comes with a couple of screws. Knowing that I'm likely to hit it occasionally with a knee, I opted for both adhesive and screws. It also comes with a couple of adhesive cable guides so the power cord can be neatly led to the back of the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnvor

customer_reviews.title: Desk Organizer for Gamer
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so my college kid asked my to purchase this for his headphones and other cables so he can keep his desk organized. I gave in and ordered it and must say that it had made organizing his cables and gadgets a lot easier. It was easy to install and it serves the intended purpose. It was delivered fast and the quality seems to be great.
customer_reviews.author: TaraFaye

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great! It fits nicely under my desk and sticks nicely to the base of a hardwood desk with the provided double sided tape. I really enjoy the two hangers with slots for cords. The charging ports work great and can fast charge my phone. The only weird thing (as others have mentioned) is that the power cable comes out of the bottom rather than the back which makes cable management look slightly less nice, but is not a real issue. I would definitely recommend this if you want to keep your phones off the desk, but in reach and if you need some charging ports close at hand.
customer_reviews.author: toefur

customer_reviews.title: Awful thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to install and study enough.. but.. It stop working!! You can't charge anything!! Not the headphones.. obviously, not the laptop or the tablet.. awful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna BC

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but this thing falls apart after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed under my work desk for about a year. The adhesive they give you for the usb and headphone holder is good but for the cable run its worthless and will soon fall down. The USB ports in the unit are what is most disappointing and will break apart after a couple months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Wave Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pass through and extra rear usb would be nice
customer_reviews.text: The device works great for charging headphones and has a good seal on the bottom of the desk without having to use screws. Holds my Logitech and beats with no issues. A rear usb would be nice the ones on the front are fine but it looks messy. 2 on the front and 1 on the back would be better. But still hands down a great device.
customer_reviews.author: umm ya

customer_reviews.title: First one was bad, second is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. My first one was bad and died if I plugged more than one thing in. The new one works great and fast charges 2 phones and my headset perfectly, the hangar is at the edge of the desk and is perfect for my headphones and VR headset. I also use it to charge my Quest, works great! Having the underside charger is sooo much better than dealing with the mass of cables I had before.
customer_reviews.author: R W

customer_reviews.title: Great for a neat desk.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for home and one for work. I attached both with wood screws I had. Does a good job of keeping cords off your desk, and works especially nice on an adjustable height standing desk. Note that there are two versions, one for charging and one to work as a hub for a computer.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I always had a hard time figuring out where to put my wireless headset so I could charge it. This was the perfect solution, I just put it under my desk under where my soundboard sits and it's out of my way but convenient to grab if I need to switch to headset. and the usb ports are perfect to charge my headset overnight or while I'm out. My fiancee even had me start putting her headset on the other side so I can charge hers with mine so we know we both have a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Tim M.

customer_reviews.title: A good product. It is well designed and came with ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product. It is well designed and came with everything I needed to mount it. The addition of the three cable guides for the power cable was a very appreciated touch. My only problem is that the power cable on the product has a smooth gouge/nick in the insulation. I did not note any exposed metal at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C.

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who always was struggling placing his headphones on the table. He loves it. Installs super easy. His desk is metal frame and the tape has stick really well and support everything he puts on it (headphones plus 2 chargers). The placement under the desk is really convenient for those that don’t want to lose desk space with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dess Colón

customer_reviews.title: Fell off immediately.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive here is not strong enough, so I wouldn't recommend this to anyone. I wanted it for my gaming headset to put under a metal desk and I followed the instruction but as soon as I started using it it fell off. Screws come with it, but that wouldn't work for my applications so if you can't use the screws to install it I wouldn't bother with this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly S. Bielawa

customer_reviews.title: Good product except for one design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Could use some minor upgrades later. The wire for the outlet is facing towards the ground when you mount the charger. I can't see a reason for this if designers knew the product would be mounted under a table where the cables would trace the table and lead to an outlet or power strip on the backside of a desk. Second, it would be nice to have something that retained the cords in place on the wire slots better.
customer_reviews.author: B. Yoshida

customer_reviews.title: Felt solid, but became unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: So to preface this, I bought this while they were using the original 3M adhesive, which stuck well to my glass desk for quite a while without any problems. Recently, it began to fail so I bought their NEW 3M VHB adhesive, which only lasted around a week before my headset fell. I really enjoy the design and the USB features, but unless you're screwing it in, it isn't sturdy, and having a glass desk I don't have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Love having the charging ports
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this has charging ports, but I wish it had a little hook at the end of each side, I mounted it under my desk on the opposite side from where I sit, but still tend to knock the headphones off too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Warren

customer_reviews.title: Never would have though to add usb port!
customer_reviews.text: So my partner keeps leaving his headphone on the computer and the cord along with two other cords are just laying on the ground connected to his computer. So then our vaccum robot kept eating them all the time. So when I found this, I knew that we had to have this. It fits his headphones perfectly and the outlets allow him to leave his cords off the ground. It was an easy mount also.
customer_reviews.author: AnneBashaway

customer_reviews.title: Buy one.  You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It fits my wired headphones, wireless headphones, and my back up headphones right under my desk. It also has 3 USB ports for charging. The USB ports charges my iPhone 7 Plus, iPad Pro and my wireless headphones at the same time with zero issues. This headphone stand eliminates so much clutter from top of my desk. I'm about to buy another for my desk in my studio.
customer_reviews.author: eelcram

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product, adheres well, and good size.
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it is intended to do. It is a solid product, holds heavy headphones sturdily, and adheres well. My only dislike (and it is minor) is the blinking button that shows you the power is working. Due to my desk configuration, I can see the blinking light and it is a minor annoyance. Overall, worthy product for what it is intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: AJLB

customer_reviews.title: I wish these were better made
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second one of these. The first one had dead USB ports, so I ordered another. Unfortunately, the quality is just not there. The USB ports are very fragile and break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Karchworld

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for headsets and charging
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to hold my headphones for my computer and it holds it real nice. Very sturdy adhesive it is not going anywhere. I also hold by Bose headphones there too along with my PC headphones. I have a 3-foot charging cable for when I need to charge my phone at my computer. If you are wanting a headset holder this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Primus

customer_reviews.title: Headset holder/usb charger.
customer_reviews.text: At first I wanted to buy the one woth a 3.5 mm headphone jack, then I decided to get this one instead. It sits under my desk and holds two headphones/headsets/Cans( audiophile term for headsets). The adhesive is strong and wont move once placed. Even has 3 USB 1.0 ports for charging 3 devices.
customer_reviews.author: Tanooki27

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great. Works as described. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: If I was a time traveler and I went back to the day that I bought this item I would not try to talk myself out of purchasing. That is a good review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Power User

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty nice and convenient headphone stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice and convenient headphone stand. I place this in my living room on my console table. It has 3 USB charging ports that are perfect for charging all my electronic devices but most importantly, it holds up my headphones and charges it quite fast. It isn't too big or bulky so it doesn't take up too much space under my desktop table either. It met all my expectations and more.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppy Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: simple, effective, didnt cheap out on the mounting tape
customer_reviews.text: Simple to mount, the 3M VHF tape is no joke, this stuff makes scotch double sided look like a joke. it would have been so easy to write this product off for having a cheap mounting solution if they used a lower quality tape. I stuck it to the leg of my desk and now it hangs, and allows me to discreetly power my USB powered RGB light strips. It hangs headphones, routes cables, provides power. I can't think of a con aside from "does not include RGB". its simple, it works. Shout out to uraverageconsumer for pointing me here.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lope

customer_reviews.title: It makes it easy to hold my headphone
customer_reviews.text: I was always forgetting to charge my bluetooth headset or where I put it. Now it's under my shelf where I can see it and it's easy to charge on. I hang my cord headset also just to keep it easy. Only con is the 2 sides have notches, not sure what the notches are for? If they went up instead front it could hang between the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, high quality, feels secure, and the USB charges things quickly!!
customer_reviews.text: What a handy little hanger! very high quality construction, feels sturdy but still relatively lightweight. The adhesive worked wonderfully for me, but I could see the appeal of using screws instead since I have no idea how hard this will be to remove in the future... I wont worry about that now. the usb ports do charge faster than if the charger cables were plugged into my PC, so that's a plus as well. Very handy if you have wireless headphones that need to be charged (via USB) as its all in one place. definitely no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: mark d

customer_reviews.title: So awesome I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I originally bought it as a lightening deal and then it was so nice I wanted to buy another but they sold out for like 3 months. Once I saw it back, I immediately bought another for my boyfriend. I love that it goes underneath the desk and helps you manage up to 3 usb charging devices all while significantly decluttering your desk and floor. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Handy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve turned a rolling coffee table into my portable media center containing TV, PC stand, and gaming console. This fits nicely and takes up little space. The stand fits securely and holds two full size over-the-ear gaming headsets. Acceptable charge speed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Keck

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works just what I expected of said product. The adhesive is very sturdy, I don't know what others are complaining about, I've even removed the adhesive and put it back on then placed the stand on another desk worth the same adhesive(double sided tape) and it still held. I've got a Logitech g933 and a steel series arctis 7 begging held up by this item with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Rain

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just should have had the cord come out the back instead of the bottom. You end up having to do a 180 with the cord to get it back to the mounting surface. If you were just gonna let the cord hang, it would be fine but I doubt many would use it that way. The little cord tenders are rubbish as they don't stay stuck to anything. Added some different adhesive and they work now.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap little piece that doesn't actually fast charge. Most devices today require more power than this is able to provide. Also, keep in mind your desk has to be pretty wide for this to be able to hang a headset and not touch your knee/thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Rameil

customer_reviews.title: works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: i screwed mine into the bottom of my desk. I have two headphones, one wired and one wireless and they both live on this when not in use. I use the USB when needed and it works perfectly. very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: geekytyrant

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just happens that I was looking something like this to hold my two headsets. The USB ports are very welcome because I can charge them there and keep the cables plugged, and I still have one free USB port for any other use. The only con: don't expect too much of the built-in adhesive. It's better to attach it with the screws provided.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Great for clearing your desk and cable management
customer_reviews.text: Great idea that I haven't seen anywhere else. Clears out desk space and allows me to charge other desktop devices (not just my headphones) easily instead of having to plug them in at the floor/wall. Only two things I can really say that are 'cons' is that I wish it connected to your computer and that the power line came out the back end of the unit instead of the bottom, but those are really just features that could be added in a future version of this product and in no way detract from it. Comes with extra cable management hooks as well, would easily recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: would have been great if not broken
customer_reviews.text: So this charger is suppose to stick to the underside of your desk and charge your stuff through USB cords. All you have to do is plug it in and it can charge your stuff. However mine does not turn on when plugged in so i have a faulty wire or something else inside it is messed up. The product did stick to my desk very well and the case was well built. i dont have time to return it for a replacement so i just have to bite the bullet on this one. : (
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hall

customer_reviews.title: Charging and Storing Headphone all at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent idea to have USB charging under the desk and a slot to store the headphone at the same time. Clear the desk space and now I also have power access to charge my other items.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperLife

customer_reviews.title: Great product (4.5 stars)
customer_reviews.text: I’m not big on reviews and never give anything 5 stars but I have yet to find anything wrong with this product. So I really want to give it 4.5 stars. It was really easy to install and holds my boyfriends headset perfectly. I love the USB ports, it frees up the ones on my laptop. The cord organizers is a great idea but the cords kinda slip out or aren’t gripped tight enough. That’s my only complaint, if you can really call that one. Small and doesn’t get in the way
customer_reviews.author: Messiah

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely handy for keeping my wireless headphones charged and stashed out of the way, which is exactly what I bought it for. I am not sure why they put the power plug out the bottom (why not put it out the back?) and why they didn't make it a hub for wired headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive does not last
customer_reviews.text: Was pretty happy with the product once I got it. Now barely 5 months installed with the supplied adhesive strip, the stand would no longer hold a headset without falling to the ground. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he has ended up using it for our Vive VR headset. He mounted it on the wall and used it to charge his controllers and hold the headset. The headset itself is pretty heavy and this keeps it secured with no issues. He is really happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great Once You Get It To Stay Put
customer_reviews.text: The sticker was incredibly tough to remove from the mounting tape. I ended up using the screws provided but they were cheap and one broke. The design is great, I just wish it was easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: KellyC

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this thing. I didn't think I would use the USB and really was just going to hang my headphones on it, but it just turned out to be so convenient. As far as hanging my headphones on it, I have a very large pair of headphones. I was actually worried at first, but I haven't had any problems, even with bumping into my desk at times.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. I have two sets of logitech headphones hanging from it charging, and one battery charger for 18650 batteries and it does not emit any amount of heat to be concerned with. Had to apply my own 3m double side tape to cable management sleeves. The tape that comes on there is very weak. But over all I love it and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t order again.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but the adhesion didn’t last 5 minutes. Item would fall off stand. Especially if headset and watch was put on. Neat idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Me and my boyfriend share a really tiny room and since we cant fit in a second nightstand on his side we use the decorative wall cubes instead. The problem with this is that he had to use an extension cord to charge all his stuff and it would constantly fall. I mounted this thing on the bottom of the cube and it makes life so much easier, no more looking under the bed for lost cords and no more extension cord. 10/10 mounts easy and works wonderfully :)
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective product
customer_reviews.text: Simple straightforward product. Easy to mount and run wires to a power source. Works awesome under my standing desk and adds additional USB support for my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gamer Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as his headphones are always falling off his desk, there isn’t a good place to set his Fitbit while charging and his phone charging cord stretches across the office. Now all 3 items are in one spot not falling down and charging from one convenient spot!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hemenway

customer_reviews.title: Compact smart charger
customer_reviews.text: Helpful gadget to streamline cords running everywhere. Plug in USB power for your peripherals right at the desk! Power cord is plenty long. Preloaded with 3M tape for locations you can't drill into. Hardware also included to install permanently.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I like it - but it won't stay up
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea, I like the design, I don't mind that the cord goes out the back - that's all workable with my set-up. I cleaned the underside of my desk, took the unit with the adhesive ready to go - put it up! Worked great for a few hours, found it on the floor the next morning. Stuck it back on, came back down. It'll stay up an hour or so, then comes down. Thinking I need to go buy some more adhesive? Desk is metal, maybe that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Macjazzmj

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Just what what I ordered. Just note when yo install it, be sure you wanna put the stance there because once its on its on. It's very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chen

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and useful
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed. The adhesive provide bonds very well so make sure you have this product where you want it as moving it after it bonds is problematic.
customer_reviews.author: Over Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good headset stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product all though be careful of where you put it under your desk as you can hit it with your knee also after about a year the usb's broke and I had to take it off. Great product none the less. From, Henry
customer_reviews.author: Brett the Jet

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I ended up drilling it in I was able to do so by hand no problem. My only complaint is I wish the cord was longer and it also seems like some of the ports are a little tight but it could be my cables. Dose the job though would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Will Platt

customer_reviews.title: pros - all usb ports and connections works fine like the design and look of this charger
customer_reviews.text: pros - all usb ports and connections works fine like the design and look of this charger, its very convenient to have and use cons - I used the sticking pad that came with the usb charger placed under desk and "waited 3 days" before I started resting my headset on this charger so the pad would have a much better stick but couple days after I started resting headset on it and its starting to unstick really slowly
customer_reviews.author: Chai H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mount. I love the under mount set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Adhesive was great but i tossed in the 2 little support screws just for longevity. Works great and looks great too
customer_reviews.author: Chazz Wyrabkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, works great. The adhesive seems to be holding well after a few weeks and doesn't show any signs of weakening. My headset is about average weight so unless you feel like your headset is pretty heavy you probably won't need to screw this in. Wireless headsets do tend to be heavier because they have batteries in them, so consider that when buying(mine is wired).
customer_reviews.author: Harrison Kogan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Holds real well under my gaming desk. When inserting a usb into the port it’s quite hard but it’s good because it holds the usb together.
customer_reviews.author: jason hnath

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Is the hanger functional, yes. You do need to have a drill or a lot of patience to manually screw it into the desk, but once it is in it is pretty sturdy. The customer service is very impressive as well. I was originally very discontent with the product and they followed up to make things right.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1 year of use. beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2018. Mounted it to my desk in my home office space. Normal temp room, nothing out of the ordinary. The device failsd after about 1 year of use. I kept an iphone charge cord always plugged in, one day I noticed my iphone wasnt charging. Swapped outlets, no power. Cheaply made crap. When I first purchased, I was happy but wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy, easy to install. Charges all my devices quickly. Only complaint is the hooks a only barely enough to hang my Razer Kracken from.... do appreciate the integrated USB cable hangers though.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Gecko

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: the item is good the only downside is the cable holders dont like to stick to my wood desk but that is not a big issue i do wish the sticky pad for the headphone holder wasnt pre attached so i could decide to use it it made using the screws a little annoying
customer_reviews.author: Lee Yuen

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for gamers
customer_reviews.text: Sticking well after a few days, holds regular gaming headphones well. I’ve saved the screws in case the sticky pads give out but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRyderD

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Study design.
customer_reviews.text: Solid little charger. Looks good and helps me organize my cords that I want to keep available for impromptu charge. I secured it with the adhesive and also the provided screws. It is very solid and sturdy now.
customer_reviews.author: AK reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Used product
customer_reviews.text: It works great, looks nice too.... other than the fact that I received a used product. It was scratched all over the entire unit, and the "thank you" cards that came with it were covered in dirt... gross!
customer_reviews.author: t.sanborn

customer_reviews.title: ... follow up on this product to simply state how amazing it is at what it does
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews but I had to follow up on this product to simply state how amazing it is at what it does. Usb charging hub, cable channels for headphones and double sided headphone hanger. i stream and Use a pair Of Sennheiser headphones as my gaming headest, and I have a pair of sony mdrx as my 'outside' headphones. Having the space to hang both while charging my phone, apple watch, and echo is far beyond what I could've asked for when thinking of any standard headphone hanger. Highly recommended, worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for headphones/chargers.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's desk. Should have got one for mine as well. Comes with routing clips for a clean install, and works well for holding headphones/cables. very nice. As others have said, it's kinda weird the cable comes out the bottom and not the back, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Slingsby

customer_reviews.title: Died in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for hanging headphones and used the chargers about once a month. 6 months in it is completely dead. Not working. sooooo now it seems not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's desk and it's super easy to install. It holds up great and charges all of his devices. I used the stickers that were in the box, but also used some screws to put into the desk to ensure it stays! Works great.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: HATED seeing my boyfriends gaming headphones all over the place. I bought this and screwed it on the underside of the desk. The sticky tape stuff didn't hold up that well but they includes screws! It charges phones, speakers, and anything with a usb. Very well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Payne

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the style of this holder and the capability to mount without screws (since I didn't own the desk) and the USB charging. I was leery at first because of many reviews saying the tape wouldn't hold, but I tried it anyhow. I followed the mounting instructions for applying the glue--standard rules: clean surface, press tightly, don't use for at least 24 hours. Mine has worked great. I've had no troubles with it holding my Corsair Void headset which is rather large and bulky. I'm ordering another one now for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Adept Developer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had something like this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This headphone stand has worked out great so far. Its low profile enough to not be noticed and the usb powered outlets work great to charge my phone. My only improvement would be to move the power cord from the bottom of the stand to the back so its easier to do cable management on the power cable.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett W.

customer_reviews.title: Tape fell off, and one end broke off where screw goes, once that goes tape useless
customer_reviews.text: yOU CANNOT HAVE IT AT EDGE ANDNOT DISCREET, FEEL SCREWS SHOULD GO HORIZONTAL OR DIAGNOLLAY NOT STABLE AND BROKE SCREW PART EASY
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming setup
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my gaming pc setup , to install it only took 2-10 minutes of deciding the best position where I would like my chords or headset to hand from. I have pulled many wires abruptly down with force accidentally as well as headphones and the adhesive shows no signs of coming off anytime soon
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Quick install and ideal headphone hanger.
customer_reviews.text: It's just about perfect. It holds 2 sets of headphones and it's so convenient to be able to charge devices. The power cable is nice and long too.
customer_reviews.author: N. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install, efficient, effective, and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Takes 5 minutes to install if even that and provides everything it promised at the highest quality you can expect. One of the best products I ever bought considering how convenient, effective, and cheap it was. Price to performance on this product is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a cool piece of kit. Works well in my gaming setup. Would work great for things other than gaming headsets as well, such as smart watches or normal headphones. The only negative I have is the USB ports are a little hard to plug stuff into. Definitely takes a little elbow grease to plug stuff in there. But other than that, great product. All in all, I'm definitely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Cam T.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and surprisingly sturdy without using the provided screws. Very convenient to have under my side table.
customer_reviews.text: The two sided tape is surprisingly strong; I have this under my side table and it hasn't budged with none of the provided screws supporting it. The wire hangers worked perfectly as well to keep it from sagging as well. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Love this, just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this, just what I needed. Convenient under-desk holder with charging. Would have loved it even more if it were a USB3 Hub and not just a charger, but it is still great for what it is. The adhesive has worked just fine so far, but I'll keep the screws handy just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended so far had it for a day easy to attach with the 3m adhesive to place under my desk to hang my headset out of way. It also comes with 4 hook things that you can use on the electrical cord to help hide and clean up the desk. Also comes. With two screws to mount the stand, I haven't used it yet but it a good touch incase the adhesive is worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Great under desk charger & headphone holder
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly under my desk. Subtle power light on it. I used the tape instead of the screws and it's really sturdy, no issues plugging/unplugging USB cables.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: perfect storage for my daughters headset. The USB ports are convenient and in great location for phone etc. My daughter is very happy with this headset holder!
customer_reviews.author: Bandaid12

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m digging it. I haven’t had it long but it’s stuck real good to my desk so thanks fam and input my headset on there to charge. I don’t really use the other USB ports lol
customer_reviews.author: Devon Rosales

product_meta.title: Headphone Stand with USB Charger COZOO Under Desk Headset Holder Mount with 3 Port USB Charging Station and iWatch Stand Smart Watch Charging Dock Dual Earphone Hanger Hook,UL Tested
product_meta.description:
Unique Features:
While other headset stands only offer a place to store your headphones, the COZOO Headset Stand is equipped with 3 USB Charging ports, providing easy Charge to your Devices. 

Fast Charging 
4.0 amps output enables the power strip charge 3 devices including your tablets and smartphones simultaneously at full speed, save your time up to 50%. With the smart technology, it can automatically identify the type of device and deliver the suitable current for your device like the original power adapter. 

Mounting tips:
1.Clean and dry the surface of the desk and the stand before installing.
2.We recommend you wait 24 hours to make the adhesive fully secure so that there is enough adhesive force between the desk and the headphone stand.
3.If hanging weight more than 500g . please install the screws.
4.This adhesive is very sticky with good quality in order to mount steady . If you can't take the adhesive cover off , You can use the hair dryer to heat it and tear it down. 

Specifications:
Material: Fireproof ABS+PC
Rated Input: AC 110-240V, 50/60Hz 
USB Total Output: DC 5V 4.0A (max) 
Power Cord Length: 6.6ft / 2m
Overall Dimensions: 5.1 × 4 × 2.4 inchs / 130 x 102 x 60 mm
Headband Plate Dimensions: 2 × 1.2 inchs / 50 x 30 mm each
screw Dimensions: Φ0.16 × 0.6 inch / Φ4 × 15 mm
Weight: 5.8oz / 165 g

Please Note:
The USB ports functions as a USB Charging only, for charging your Phones or Tablets. And it's not as a USB Hub to connect the devices to your computer. Headphone in the picture is not included. 
If you would like to buy under desk headphone hanger with USB Hub, please refer to this product: www.amazon.com/dp/B07D48GDZ4
feature_bullets: All in one design: Under-desk headphone stand + 3 USB charging hub(4A/20W)
Under-Stand:Keeps your headphones out of sight & easy to reach and Can hold two sets of headphones.
3 Port Smart USB Charger: detects your device automatically to deliver its fastest possible charge speed up to 2.4 amps per port or 4 amps overall.
Safe Guard:Fire-resistant and hardened plastic outer shell for durability, build-in premium circuitry and microchip ensure device safety,UL Tested.

QUALITY GUARANTY:Confidence in our products, we provide 90-Day Money Back Guarantee and 24-month warranty (we will replace new one to you instead of repair) that ensures you a total hassle-free purchasing. If there is any quality issue for this headphone rack or you are not happy with your purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us.
